Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions from parents.

What if my child can't make it to a lesson?

We offer makeup lessons for absences with at least 24 hours notice. Simply WhatsApp us to reschedule.

Is there a registration fee or material fee?

No hidden fees. The monthly fee includes all worksheets, practice papers, and materials. There's no registration fee.

How do I know if my child is improving?

You'll receive monthly progress reports with detailed feedback on your child's strengths and areas for improvement. We also have termly parent-teacher meetings.

Can I sit in during the trial lesson?

Absolutely! We encourage parents to observe the first lesson. It helps you see our teaching style and how your child responds.

What if my child needs help outside of lesson time?

All students have access to WhatsApp homework support. They can send questions anytime, and our teachers will respond within 24 hours (usually much faster).

Still Have Questions?

Give us a call or WhatsApp us. We're happy to answer any questions you have.
